sentences.en: a blocked air vent
sentences.cn: 堵塞的通风口

sentences.en: a volcanic vent
sentences.cn: 火山口

sentences.en: Children give vent to their anger in various ways.
sentences.cn: 儿童用各种方法发泄怒气。

sentences.en: He gave vent to his anger by kicking the chair.
sentences.cn: 他猛踢椅子,以此泄怒.

sentences.en: He gave vent to his anger by swearing loudly.
sentences.cn: 他高声咒骂以发泄他的愤怒.

sentences.en: He knew that if he gave full vent to his feelings, it would upset Joanna.
sentences.cn: 他知道，要是他把自己的情绪全部发泄出来，就会把乔安娜惹火的。

sentences.en: He presses the rubber stopper firmly down on the vent.
sentences.cn: 他使橡胶塞牢固地塞进盖上的排气孔.

sentences.en: He squatted on the floor and gave vent to a deep sigh.
sentences.cn: 他蹲在地板上，深深叹了一口气。

sentences.en: Quite a lot of steam escaped from the vent at the front of the machine.
sentences.cn: 大量蒸汽从机器前部的排风口冒了出来。

sentences.en: She gave vent to her anger and jealousy.
sentences.cn: 她宣泄了自己的愤怒和嫉妒。

sentences.en: She longed to be alone that she might give full vent to her sorrow and despair.
sentences.cn: 她渴望独处,以便充分发泄悲痛和失望的心情.

sentences.en: She telephoned her best friend to vent her frustration.
sentences.cn: 她给最要好的朋友打电话倾诉自己的沮丧。

sentences.en: She was giving full vent to her passionate hatred.
sentences.cn: 她在充分地发泄她那燃烧的仇恨.

sentences.en: The cabby gave vent to an angry shout.
sentences.cn: 出租车司机气得大吼一声。

sentences.en: The feelings pent up through the day would have vent.
sentences.cn: 一天闷住了的感情必得要发泄一下了.

sentences.en: The meeting gave us a chance to vent our spleen (= anger ).
sentences.cn: 这次会议给了我们一次泄愤的机会。

sentences.en: The news has taken vent.
sentences.cn: 消息给泄漏了.

sentences.en: The steam found a vent through a crack in the pipe.
sentences.cn: 蒸气从管子的裂缝漏出去.

sentences.en: There was a small air vent in the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 天花板上有个小小的通风孔。

sentences.en: When I get so frustrated and angry, I have to vent my spleen on someone.
sentences.cn: 当我非常灰心丧气、憋着一肚子火时, 就得找人出气.

words.tran_cn: 发表；使…通风（ventilate的过去分词）
使通风；给…装通风设备；宣布
放出；（通过排泄等）减轻压力

phrases.tran_cn: 气孔；排气孔；通气管；气体出口
深海热泉；深海热液喷口
排气系统；通风系统；通气管系统

trans.tran_cn: 通风孔，排气孔，（感情等的）发泄，吐露，（鸟，虫，鱼的）肛门
trans.tran_en: a hole or pipe through which gases, liquid etc can enter or escape from an enclosed space or container
to do something violent or harmful to express feelings of anger, hatred etc
to express feelings of anger, hatred etc, especially by doing something violent or harmful
to express feelings of anger, hatred etc, especially by doing something violent or harmful

trans.tran_cn: 表达，发泄（感情，尤指愤怒），给…开孔，放出，（通过排泄等）减轻压力
